member.name: P:Lykke.Service.IroncladDecorator.Clients.OAuthClientProperties.AllowedAuthorizationFlows
member.summary: Set of allowed authorization flows for client.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.IroncladDecorator.Clients.OAuthClientProperties.AllowOfflineAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [allow offline access]. Defaults to false. Allow or disallow issuing of refresh_tokens.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.IroncladDecorator.Clients.OAuthClientProperties.RequirePkce
member.summary: Specifies whether a proof key is required for authorization code based token requests (defaults to false). plain PKCE are disallowed by default. This property configures usage of encoded PKCE's.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.IroncladDecorator.Clients.OAuthClientProperties.RequireClientSecret
member.summary: If set to false, no client secret is needed to request tokens at the token endpoint (defaults to true)
